issue.title: Valkyrie Drops to the Ground due to incorrect delays in startup script

content.raw: @jordanlack Yes, the fixes are included in our 0.8.1 tag [here](https://github.com/ihmcrobotics/ihmc-open-robotics-software/tree/0.8.1). In the process of fixing this, we found some bugs with running from local source though. So in order to run the sim against that tag, you'd also need to grab the latest release from our [ihmc_ros_core repo](https://github.com/ihmcrobotics/ihmc_ros_core/tree/0.8.1) and prepend that to your ROS_PACKAGE_PATH.
content.html: @jordanlack Yes, the fixes are included in our 0.8.1 tag here. In the process of fixing this, we found some bugs with running from local source though. So in order to run the sim against that tag, you'd also need to grab the latest release from our ihmc_ros_core repo and prepend that to your ROS_PACKAGE_PATH.
